title: Mud Cows & Corn : This Farm Wife Farm Life

tasks.task: Driving through mud to tend to farm animals.
subtasks: Navigate through mud to reach the farm.
Check on calves.
Feed animals in muddy conditions.
Drop off children at school.
Pick up children from school location (Miss Jackson's).
Calculate change from purchases at local store.
Help friend with dairy steers.
Drive extra trailer for agricultural purposes.
Tolerate cold (55-degree day).
Deal with rain and mud from previous weekend.

tasks.task: Caring for calving cows and calves.
subtasks: Manage smaller lots for calving cows.
Prepare to run cows through chute.
Work on cows and move them to pasture.
Deliver children to homeschool co-op.
Utilize freelance writing opportunities.
Edit pictures for online magazine.
Make phone call for business.
Utilize rural internet and cell phone service.
Close remaining corn bags for deer hunters.
Explain corn harvesting process.
Allow husband to perform specific tasks.
Deal with weeds in the field (mention of M in the way).
Address delays in feeding schedule.
Transport calves to market.
Hold gates, despite professional qualifications.
Mention of brand in the conversation.
